articles.description: A great franchise mode on top of an already thrilling racing sim
articles.content: Two years ago, I called F1 2018 the realization of my racing dreams. At this point, the team at Codemasters Birmingham have been stewards of the official Formula 1 game for more than a decade. They'r… [+7819 chars]
